sources.title: DrumTaps
sources.description: Skinner (Hooper Atchley) and his gang are grabbing land from the ranchers. When they go after Carey's ranch Ken (Ken Maynard) stops them. Skinner frames Ken for rustling but the Sheriff (Edward Peil Sr.) is on Ken's side, and with the help of his brother Earl's (Kermit Maynard) Boy Scout troup they go after the gang.
